content: Don't laugh. I don't think the NFL is not going to not let him back in - and, from a historical standpoint, quarterback is probably the weakest impact position on the Bears (I've been a Bear fan all my life). Chicago is too tough a town for Michael Vick (if the fans and sportswsriters don't get him, playing in Soldier Field in November and December will). He'll end up somewhere, though.
